name: BallCoinz
description:
You start the game with 30 balls. 15 are big and lighter and 15 are smaller and heavier.

You must click the mouse on the top side of the board to drop balls.

Click the left mouse button to drop a big ball and the right mouse button to drop a small ball.

Your goal is to collect coins on the board as the balls touch them.

Each coin gives you an extra ball.

More coins will appear as you progress.
